metadata.description: Presenting four titanic tales of the Golden Avenger! Fan-faves Adam Warren and Salva Espin bring the Titanium Man out of retirement...but is Tony Stark ready for the shocking upgrade a pint-sized hacker's given his old foe? PLUS! Pepper Potts gets put through the wringer with a literally killer commute! Can Tony and Maria Hill stop fighting each other long enough to stop Ultimo from trashing Arizona?! And will Tony's college reunion turn into a free-for-all when a spiteful classmate hijacks his armor? It's thrills and thrusters in the Mighty Marvel style!
metadata.name: Iron Man: Titanium , Vol. 1
